CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 30, 1961, pg. 2, reads: "It's Christmas Time - Cafe society's sophisticates have nothing on these two pint-sized "babes" who have really gotten into the swing of things with their own version of the twist. Renea Wilson (left) plays it real cool, while Robbin [Robin] Bullard (right) lets loose with a tricky step.  The occasion was a Christmas party for Robbin, given by her grandmother, at 2801 Bedford Ave. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Renea Wilson, and Robin Bullard wearing striped top, dancing in living room of home of Margaret Bullard, with other girls and boys watching, for Christmas party, 2801 Bedford Avenue
